Detailed Description

static void edu.ou.asgbook.rbf.DataSimulator.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00050                                                             {
00051         int nrows = 100;
00052         int ncols = 100;
00053         Pixel[] centers = new Pixel[]{ new Pixel(nrows/4,ncols/3,20), new Pixel(nrows/3,ncols/2,10) };
00054         double[] sigmax = new double[] { nrows/12, ncols/8 };
00055         double[] sigmay = new double[] { nrows/8, ncols/12 };
00056         LatLonGrid m = DataSimulator.simulateData(centers, sigmax, sigmay, nrows, ncols);
00057         
00058         // write out as image, for viewing
00059         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("rbf");
00060         KmlWriter.write(m, out, "simulated", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00061     
00062         System.out.println("Done");
00063     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.rbf.DataSimulator.simulateData ( LatLonGrid  result,
Pixel[]  centers,
double[]  sigmax,
double[]  sigmay 
) [static] 

00031                                                                                                          {
00032         for (int i=0; i < result.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < result.getNumLon(); ++j){
00033             double tot = 0;
00034             for (int k=0; k < centers.length; ++k){
00035                 double xdist = i - centers[k].getX();
00036                 double ydist = j - centers[k].getY();
00037                 double xnorm = (xdist*xdist) / (sigmax[k] * sigmax[k]);
00038                 double ynorm = (ydist*ydist) / (sigmay[k] * sigmay[k]);
00039                 double wt = Math.exp(-(xnorm + ynorm));
00040                 tot += wt * centers[k].getValue();
00041             }
00042             if ( tot > 0 ){
00043                 result.setValue(i, j, (int) Math.round(tot));
00044             } else {
00045                 result.setValue(i, j, 0);
00046             }
00047         }
00048     }

double[]  sigmay,
int  nrows,
int  ncols 
) [static] 

00022                                                                                                                   {
00023         LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon(38, -100);
00024         double latres = 0.01;
00025         double lonres = 0.01;
00026         LatLonGrid result = new LatLonGrid(nrows, ncols, -999, nwCorner, latres, lonres );
00027         simulateData(result, centers, sigmax, sigmay);
00028         return result;
00029     }
